casebody.data:
No. 945. Tarrant v. Gilletson.

November Term, 1880.

November 29th, 1880.

Hearing of appeal suspended until the next term, to enable defendant, appellant, to make application to the Circuit Court, (notwithstanding the pendency of the appeal,) for a re-hearing of the ■case, upon the ground of after-discovered evidence. Opinion

per curiam,
